about_the_game:
(Translate by machine)《Small Hero Survive》 is a single player game of monster building and survival. Here, you will choose characters and weapons, build your own village, manufacture various equipment, eliminate many enemies, and learn skills to strengthen your character. Use different weapons to unlock character skills and defeat more enemies.

Level:
There are a total of 25 waves of monster spawning. After defeating the boss in level 25, you can win. After victory, you can choose to continue fighting and enter infinite wave mode, where you can continue to spawn monsters. The game failed when the base was destroyed. After victory, you can unlock the skills to use weapons and earn points by killing (points are currently not effective, plan to open the points store in the future to unlock external technologies and modules)

Buff:
The various combinations between the 11 buffs will provide more assistance for battles.

Role:
Currently, 6 characters can be selected.

Weapons:
There are a total of 34 initial weapon options, and using the weapon to clear the level can unlock the skills carried by the weapon.

Construction:
Buildings are designed to provide assistance in battles, increasing experience points and temporary gains for characters during production and consumption. They can also be used to build barracks and temporary defense walls to resist enemies. (Planning to make defense towers and more enhancement buildings)

Skills:
All characters have a total of 100+skills accumulated. Before battle, select at least 20 skills. After upgrading, randomly select 3 skills based on their rarity for players to choose from. If there are no desired skills, players can also choose to increase their character attributes.

Module:
Each Module has its own rating, and the rating must be balanced (similar to the initial talent selection of the stars), with the aim of providing more talents to play.
